name: Evasion
rules: When you are subjected to an effect that allows a Dexterity saving throw for half damage, you take no damage on a success and half damage on a failure.
limits: You don't benefit from this feature while you have the Incapacitated condition.

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/phb2024/05-Character Classes (Continued) - Player's Handbook - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf

trigger: when you are subjected to an effect that allows a Dexterity saving throw for half damage
